00017 
00018 std::pair<DbCore::seq_iter, DbCore::seq_iter> 
00019 DbCore::find_after(EUROPA::TimelineId const &tl, TICK now) {
00020   sequence_type const &seq = tl->getTokenSequence();
00021   seq_iter i = seq.begin(), last = seq.end();
00022 
00023   for(; last!=i && (*i)->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=now; ++i);
00024   return  std::make_pair(i, last);
00025 }
00026 
00027 EUROPA::TokenId DbCore::find_current(EUROPA::TimelineId const &tl, TICK now) {
00028   seq_iter i, last;
00029   boost::tie(i, last) = find_after(tl, now);
00030   
00031   if( last!=i ) {
00032     if( (*i)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=now )
00033       return *i;
00034   }
00035   return EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00036 }

00040 
00041 DbCore::DbCore(EuropaReactor &owner)
00042   :EUROPA::PlanDatabaseListener(owner.assembly().plan_db()),
00043    m_reactor(owner) {}
00044 
00045 DbCore::~DbCore() {}

00048 
00049 void DbCore::initialize() {
00050   TICK initial = m_reactor.getInitialTick();
00051   EUROPA::TokenSet const &all = m_reactor.assembly().plan_db()->getTokens();  
00052   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain mission_scope(initial, m_reactor.getFinalTick()),
00053     end_scope(initial+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00054 
00055   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=all.begin(); all.end()!=i; ++i) {
00056     if( (*i)->isFact() ) {
00057       // First check that the fact applies to a single object
00058       if( !(*i)->getObject()->baseDomain().isSingleton() ) 
00059        throw TokenError(**i, "Facts should be associated to a single object"); 
00060 
00061       // extract the object
00062       EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &domain=(*i)->getObject()->baseDomain();
00063       EUROPA::ObjectId object = domain.getObject(domain.getSingletonValue());
00064 
00065       // check that he object is not en external timeline
00066       if( m_reactor.assembly().isExternal(object) ) 
00067        throw TokenError(**i, "Facts cannot be applied to external timelines");
00068 
00069       // OK now should I ignore this fact 
00070       if( m_reactor.assembly().isIgnored(object) ) {
00071        m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Ignoring the fact "<<object->toString()
00072                           <<'.'<<(*i)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString()
00073                           <<" as its object is on the Ignore list.";
00074        m_reactor.assembly().ignore(*i);
00075       } else {
00076        if( (*i)->start()->baseDomain().getLowerBound() > mission_scope.getUpperBound() 
00077            || (*i)->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound() < end_scope.getLowerBound() ) {
00078          m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Ignoring the fact "<<object->toString()
00079                             <<'.'<<(*i)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString()
00080                             <<" as it is outside of mission scope";
00081          m_reactor.assembly().ignore(*i);
00082        } else {
00083          EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain start_bounds(mission_scope), 
00084            end_bounds(end_scope);
00085          start_bounds.intersect((*i)->start()->baseDomain());
00086          end_bounds.intersect((*i)->end()->baseDomain());
00087          if( !start_bounds.isEmpty() )
00088            (*i)->start()->restrictBaseDomain(start_bounds);
00089          if( !end_bounds.isEmpty() )
00090            (*i)->end()->restrictBaseDomain(end_bounds);
00091          (*i)->activate();
00092          object->constrain(*i, *i);
00093        }
00094       }
00095     }
00096   }
00097 }

00099 void DbCore::set_internal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) {
00100   m_internals.insert(std::make_pair(obj, EUROPA::TokenId::noId()));
00101 }

00103 void DbCore::notify(state_map::value_type const &obs) {
00104   std::pair<state_map::iterator, bool> ret = m_externals.insert(obs);
00105   if( !ret.second ) {
00106     EUROPA::TokenId pred = ret.first->second;
00107     m_completed_obs.insert(pred);
00108     ret.first->second = obs.second;
00109   }
00110   debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()<<"] OBSERVATION "
00111           <<obs.first->toString()
00112           <<'.'<<obs.second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool DbCore::update_externals() {
00116   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00117   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain now(cur, cur), future(cur+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00118  
00119   // First terminate former observations
00120   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=m_completed_obs.begin();
00121       m_completed_obs.end()!=i; ++i) {
00122     debugMsg("trex:sync", '['<<cur<<"] closing old observation "
00123             <<(*i)->toString()<<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00124     (*i)->end()->restrictBaseDomain(now);    
00125     debugMsg("trex:sync", "\tend="
00126             <<(*i)->end()->baseDomain().toString());
00127     // if( (*i)->canBeTerminated(cur+1) ) {
00128     //   debugMsg("trex:sync", '['<<cur<<"] terminating old observation "
00129     //               <<(*i)->toString());
00130     //   (*i)->terminate();
00131     // }
00132   }
00133   m_completed_obs.clear();
00134   
00135   // Now apply inertial value asumption on cuureent observations
00136   for(state_map::const_iterator i=m_externals.begin(); m_externals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00137     debugMsg("trex:sync", '['<<cur<<"] applying inertial value assumption to "
00138             <<i->first->toString()
00139             <<'.'<<i->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00140     i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);    
00141   }
00142   debugMsg("trex:sync", '['<<cur<<"] Propagating external state updates");
00143   return propagate();
00144 }
00145 
00146 bool DbCore::synchronize() {
00147   size_t steps = 0;
00148   
00149   if( resolve(steps) ) {
00150     if( update_internals(steps) ) {
00151       if( resolve(steps) ) {
00152        debugMsg("trex:sync", "SUCESS after "<<steps<<" steps.");
00153        return true;
00154       } else 
00155        debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to resolve internal timelines updates");
00156     } else
00157       debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to identify internal timelines state");
00158   } else
00159     debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to resolve current state");
00160   return false;
00161 }
00162 
00163 bool DbCore::process_agenda(EUROPA::TokenSet agenda, size_t &steps) {
00164   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00165   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00166 
00167   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=agenda.begin(); agenda.end()!=i; ++i) {
00168     if( (*i)->getObject()->lastDomain().isSingleton() && (*i)->isInactive() ) {
00169       EUROPA::TokenId cand;
00170       
00171       if( assembly.in_synch_scope(*i, cand) ) {
00172        debugMsg("trex:agenda", "resolving "<<(*i)->toString());
00173        ++steps;
00174        if( !( assembly.resolve(*i, cand, steps) && propagate() ) ) {
00175          debugMsg("trex:agenda", "FAILED to resolve "<<(*i)->toString());
00176          return false;
00177        }
00178       }
00179     }      
00180   }
00181   return true;
00182 }
00183 
00184 bool DbCore::resolve(size_t &steps) {
00185   size_t last_count;
00186   // Loop until quiescence
00187   do {
00188     last_count = steps;
00189     
00190     if( !propagate() )
00191       return false;
00192 
00193     // first process the facts
00194     condDebugMsg(!m_facts_agenda.empty(), "trex:sync", 
00195                m_facts_agenda.size()<<" facts in the agenda.");
00196     if( !process_agenda(m_facts_agenda, steps) ) {
00197       debugMsg("trex:sync", "Failed to resolve facts");
00198       return false;
00199     }
00200     // then process everything else
00201     condDebugMsg(!m_agenda.empty(), "trex:sync", 
00202                m_agenda.size()<<" tokens in the agenda.");
00203     if( !process_agenda(m_agenda, steps) ) {
00204       debugMsg("trex:sync", "Failed to resolve tokens");
00205       return false;
00206     }
00207   } while( last_count!=steps );
00208   return true;
00209 }
00210 
00211 bool DbCore::update_internals(size_t &steps) {
00212   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00213   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00214   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain future(cur, PLUS_INFINITY);
00215   std::list<EUROPA::TokenId> new_tokens;
00216   
00217   if( assembly.invalid() )
00218     return false;
00219   for(state_map::const_iterator i=m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00220     EUROPA::TokenId active = i->second,
00221       last_obs = find_current(i->first, cur);
00222 
00223     if( active.isId() ) {
00224       active->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00225       if( active->isMerged() )
00226       active = active->getActiveToken();
00227     }
00228 
00229     if( last_obs.isNoId() ) {
00230       debugMsg("trex:sync", '['<<cur<<"] setting "<<i->first->toString()
00231               <<" state to its default.");
00232       if( !assembly.insert_default(i->first, last_obs, steps) ) {
00233        debugMsg("trex:sync", "FAILED to insert default value on "
00234                <<i->first->toString());
00235        return false;
00236       }
00237     }
00238     
00239     if( last_obs->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()>=cur ) {
00240       last_obs->start()->specify(cur);
00241       if( last_obs!=active && active.isId() )
00242        active->end()->specify(cur);    
00243     }
00244   }
00245   if( !propagate() )
00246     return false;
00247   return true;
00248 }
00249 
00250 bool DbCore::reset_goal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, bool aggressive) {
00251   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00252   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain future(cur, PLUS_INFINITY);
00253   EUROPA::TokenId active = (tok->isMerged()?tok->getActiveToken():tok);
00254   
00255   if( active->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<cur ) {
00256     debugMsg("trex:relax", "DISCARD completed goal "<<tok->toString()
00257             <<": "<<tok->getPredicateName().toString());
00258     return true;
00259   }
00260   if( tok->start()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00261     if( aggressive ) {
00262       debugMsg("trex:relax", "DISCARD goal started  in the past "<<tok->toString()
00263               <<": "<<tok->getPredicateName().toString());
00264       return true;
00265     }
00266   }
00267   
00268   return false;
00269 }
00270 
00271 bool DbCore::relax(bool aggressive) {
00272   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00273 
00274   m_reactor.log("core")<<"Beginning database relax"
00275                      <<(aggressive?" and forget about the past":"");
00276   debugMsg("trex:relax", "START "<<(aggressive?"aggressive ":"")<<"relax");
00277   // Put the solver out of the way 
00278   assembly.solver().clear();
00279   assembly.mark_inactive();
00280 
00281   EUROPA::TokenSet all = assembly.plan_db()->getTokens();
00282   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00283 
00284   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=all.begin(); all.end()!=i; ++i) {
00285     if( (*i)->isFact() ) {
00286       if( aggressive && (*i)->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00287        // In aggressive mode we get rid of the past 
00288        debugMsg("trex:relax", "DISCARD past fact "<<(*i)->toString()
00289                <<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00290        (*i)->discard();
00291       } else 
00292        (*i)->cancel();
00293     } else if( is_goal(*i) ) {
00294       if( reset_goal(*i, aggressive) )
00295        (*i)->discard();
00296       else {
00297        std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars = (*i)->getVariables();
00298        (*i)->cancel();
00299 
00300        for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator v=vars.begin();
00301            vars.end()!=v; ++v) {
00302          if( (*v)->canBeSpecified() && (*v)->isSpecified() )
00303            (*v)->reset();
00304          (*v)->relax();
00305        }
00306       }
00307     } else if( assembly.internal(*i) ) {
00308       // internal objects are either merged with a fact (or a goal) or 
00309       // from the future
00310       (*i)->discard();
00311     } else if( assembly.overlaps_now(*i) ) {
00312       if( aggressive ) {
00313        condDebugMsg(!(*i)->isMerged(), "trex:relax", "DISCARD token "
00314                    <<(*i)->toString()<<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00315        (*i)->discard();
00316       } else if( !(*i)->isInactive() )
00317        (*i)->cancel();
00318     }
00319   }
00320   
00321   debugMsg("trex:relax", "SUCESS");
00322   m_reactor.logPlan();
00323   return true;
00324 }
00325 
00326 void DbCore::step() {
00327   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00328 
00329   debugMsg("trex:step", '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()<<"] START deliberation step");
00330   
00331   if( propagate() ) {
00332     DbSolver &solver = assembly.solver();
00333     
00334     if( assembly.inactive() ) 
00335       assembly.mark_active();
00336     solver.step();
00337     process_pending();
00338     if( solver.noMoreFlaws() ) 
00339       m_reactor.end_deliberation();
00340   }
00341 }
00342 
00343 void DbCore::doDispatch() {
00344   // todo add a notion of guards to avoid to dispatch too early
00345   for( state_map::const_iterator i=m_externals.begin();
00346        m_externals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00347     TICK from, to;
00348     if( m_reactor.dispatch_window(i->first, from, to) ) {
00349       seq_iter it, last;
00350       boost::tie(it, last) = find_after(i->first, from);
00351 
00352       // skipp the tokens that are necessarily before from 
00353       for( ;last!=it && (*it)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<from; ++it);
00354 
00355       // now dispatch tokens that can start before to 
00356       // and are not part of deliberation
00357       for( ;last!=it && (*it)->start()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()<to; ++it)
00358        if( !m_reactor.assembly().in_deliberation(*it) )
00359          m_reactor.request(i->first, *it);
00360     }
00361   }
00362 }
00363 
00364 void DbCore::doNotify() {
00365   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00366   EUROPA::DbClientId cli = m_reactor.assembly().plan_db()->getClient();
00367   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain now(cur, cur), future(cur+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00368 
00369   for(state_map::iterator i=m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00370     // Look for current state in the plan
00371     EUROPA::TokenId active = i->second,
00372       last_obs = find_current(i->first, cur);
00373 
00374     last_obs->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00375     if( active.isId() ) {
00376       if( active->isMerged() )
00377        active = active->getActiveToken();
00378     }
00379     if( active!=last_obs ) {
00380       // create the fact
00381       EUROPA::TokenId obs = cli->createToken(last_obs->getPredicateName().c_str(),
00382                                         NULL, false, true);
00383       obs->start()->restrictBaseDomain(now);
00384       obs->getObject()->specify(i->first->getKey());
00385       cli->merge(obs, last_obs);
00386       propagate();
00387       // restrict all the attribute and the object
00388       obs->getObject()->restrictBaseDomain(obs->getObject()->getLastDomain());
00389 
00390       for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator 
00391            p=obs->parameters().begin(); obs->parameters().end()!=p; ++p) 
00392        (*p)->restrictBaseDomain((*p)->lastDomain());
00393       if( i->second.isId() ) {
00394        i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(now);
00395        // if( i->second->canBeTerminated(cur+1) ) {
00396        //     i->second->terminate();
00397        // }
00398       }
00399       i->second = obs;
00400       m_reactor.notify(i->first, i->second);
00401     }
00402     i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00403   }
00404 }
00405 
00406 bool DbCore::propagate() {
00407   if( m_reactor.assembly().propagate() ) {
00408     process_pending();
00409     return true;
00410   }
00411   debugMsg("trex:core", "Failed to propagate");
00412   return false;
00413 }
00414 
00415 void DbCore::process_pending() {
00416   EUROPA::TokenSet pending;
00417   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain scope(m_reactor.getInitialTick(),
00418                               m_reactor.getFinalTick());
00419   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00420   
00421   std::swap(pending, m_pending);
00422   condDebugMsg(!pending.empty(), "trex:pending", '['<<cur<<"] "
00423               <<pending.size()<<" pending tokens");
00424   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=pending.begin(); pending.end()!=i; ++i) {
00425     if( m_reactor.assembly().ignored(*i) ) {
00426       debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<cur<<"] IGNORE "<<(*i)->toString()
00427               <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00428     } else {
00429       EUROPA::TokenId master = (*i)->master();
00430       
00431       if( master.isNoId() ) {
00432        if( (*i)->getState()->baseDomain().isMember(EUROPA::Token::REJECTED) ) {
00433          m_goals.insert(*i);
00434          // A new goal necessirly start during the mission 
00435          (*i)->start()->restrictBaseDomain(scope);
00436          propagate();
00437          debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<cur<<"] GOAL "<<(*i)->toString()
00438                  <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00439        }
00440       }
00441       if( (*i)->isFact() ) {
00442        debugMsg("trex:token", '['<<cur<<"] FACT "<<(*i)->toString()
00443                <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00444       }
00445       if( (*i)->isInactive() )
00446        add_to_agenda(*i);
00447     }
00448   }
00449 }
00450 
00451 void DbCore::add_to_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00452   m_pending.erase(token);
00453   if( token->isFact() ) 
00454     m_facts_agenda.insert(token);
00455   else 
00456     m_agenda.insert(token);
00457 }
00458 
00459 void DbCore::remove_from_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00460   if( token->isFact() ) 
00461     m_facts_agenda.erase(token);
00462   else 
00463     m_agenda.erase(token);
00464 }

00468 void DbCore::notifyAdded(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00469   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "ADD "<<token->toString()
00470           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00471   m_pending.insert(token);
00472 }
00473 
00474 void DbCore::notifyRemoved(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00475   debugMsg("trex:token:state", "REMOVE "<<token->toString()
00476           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00477   m_pending.erase(token);
00478   remove_from_agenda(token);
00479   m_goals.erase(token);
00480   m_completed_obs.erase(token);
00481 }

00485           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00486   remove_from_agenda(token);
